result.name: 16s-rrna-gene-sequencing-of-filtered-groundwater-from-8-boreholes-in-cambodia-nerc-grant-ne-p01
result.notes: This dataset represents the raw reads from sequencing the V4 hyper-variable region of the 16S rRNA gene on an Illumina MiSeq platform. The samples are filtered groundwater samples from 8 boreholes from a sandy-dominated site and a clay-dominated site in Cambodia that show arsenic concentrations above the WHO recommended limit, and were collected in May 2019.
